projects: [{"title":"Bangalore House Price Prediction Model Using Data Science and Machine Learning","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Jan 2020","description":"â€¢Performed Data Cleaning operations using Pandas and Numpy Libraries and applied Linear Regression, Lasso and Ridge Models to check the differences in their Prediction Levelsâ€¢Achieved an accuracy level of 82% using Linear Regression and displayed the Total Price of Property based on user choice of No .of BHKs, Locality, No of Bathrooms and Carpet Area"},{"title":"Recommendation Systems: Movie Predictor using NLTK Library and Vectorisation","start_date":"Sep 2018","end_date":"Oct 2018","description":"â€¢Created a database of 5000 Movies using TMDB Dataset (Kaggle) using Python for recommendation of 5 Similar Movies based on user input.â€¢Text Similarity using Vectorisation that finds out Similarity Score of Tags using Cosine Similarity (Distance) which in turn predicts closest 5 Substitutesâ€¢Used Streamlit Library in PyCharm to deploy the Movie Recommender System on Local Host"}]
